baseline_groups.claim_summary: Electrification (instrumented by land gradient) increases female employment rate in rural KwaZulu-Natal communities
baseline_groups.notes: IV (2SLS) with mean_grad_new as instrument for T. Three baseline variants: Table 4 Col 9 (full controls + services + district FE), Col 8 (full controls, no services, with FE), Col 7 (full controls, no services, no FE). All on largeareas==1 sample (N=1816). Clustered at placecode0.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Electrification (instrumented by land gradient) has no significant effect on male employment rate in rural KwaZulu-Natal communities
baseline_groups.notes: Same IV design as G1 but with d_prop_emp_m as outcome. Mirrors G1 structure exactly. Paper reports a null result for male employment.

global_notes: Surface-driven run. Both baseline groups match the pre-run surface exactly. No adjustments needed. Run numbers 41-42 are skipped (likely reserved for inference variants or diagnostics computed separately). The rc/estimation/ols_reduced_form specs use a nonstandard namespace and report treatment_var=T while the focal coefficient is actually on mean_grad_new (the instrument); this is a metadata labeling issue, not a validity problem. The CVJ for reduced-form rows contains an 'estimation' top-level key instead of the standard 'extra' key, a minor schema deviation.
